column5: Hi Folks, just bought a water pressure gauge today, got everything hooked up on the dash already, but I have no idea where the other end of the hose connects to...The motor is 2004 Mercury Optimax 115hp. Instruction with picture or diagram would be great!  Here are some pictures of the motor:           Thanks a bunch!!!   Jackie
omg, you're still working on it? lol
Your Mercury dealer will have the hydraulic fitting to tap into that grey coiled line zip tied to the back of the motor

http://1manual.com/M...nual_Index.html    service manuals online.... very useful whenever your troubleshooting.  not sure if it tells you where to tap in, but it tells you the pressures you should expect
